name: BioShock 2: Sinclair Solutions Test Pack
description:
BioShock 2: Sinclair Solutions Test Pack is an action-shooter game developed by 2K Marin. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play BioShock 2: Sinclair Solutions Test Pack on PC and PlayStation 3.
